this_title: Memories of a Murderer: The Nilsen Tapes
trans_title: 杀人回忆录：尼尔森的自白
introduction: Britain’s most notorious serial killer, Dennis Nilsen, confessed to killing 15 people in 1983. Over a five-year period, he picked up vulnerable young men, lured them back to his home and strangled them, before disposing of their bodies under the floorboards.The truth about how and why he killed has been the subject of much speculation in books and documentaries over the decade...
chinese_title: 杀人回忆录：尼尔森的自白
foreign_title: Memories of a Murderer: The Nilsen Tapes
